_header: I trow in God Father of might that all has wrought
Note:
For other versions, see 540, 1200 [A Latin text occurs in Oxford, Corpus Christi College 155 at f. 269. A very similar English version (18 lines) is inserted in two MSS of the Lay Folk’s Mass Book (Simmons (1879)
XSimmons, Thomas Frederick. The Lay Folks’ Mass Book.
EETS o.s. 71 (1879); repr. 1968, 20-3)].
_description: The Creed, with the clauses assigned to the Apostles — ten couplets (twelve Apostles named)
